name: Bad to the Bone
effect:
Reverse any Maneuver or Action card played by your opponent and end your opponent's turn.
You may put 1 non-unique Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Unique
"Now you see what happens when you try something in my yard...." - The Undertaker

name: Brock Lock
effect:
As a reversal, reverse any Grapple or High Risk maneuver and end your opponent's turn.
Unique
Stun Value: 2
"And here's an amazing display of agility by--- MY GOD! MY GOD! Brock's got 'im! Brock's got 'im! Folks, he ain't lettin' go!" - Jim Ross

name: Do You Know Who I Am?
effect:
Cannot be played if your opponent has 4 or fewer cards in his Arsenal.
Can only be played if you have 3 or greater Stun Value in your Ring area.
You must overturn 3 cards from your Arsenal into your Ringside pile.
Your opponent must overturn cards from his Arsenal into his Ringside pile until he has either overturned a total of 4 Reversal cards OR until he has 4 cards left in his Arsenal. End your turn.
Unique
"You've got to be freakin' kidding me, right? Okay, which one of you has any gold medals?" - Kurt Angle

name: Edge's Spear
effect:
Cannot be reversed if played after the card titled From the Top Rope.
As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played maneuver.
As a reversal, reverse any card played after the card titled Irish Whip and end your opponent's turn.
Multi
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"Off the ropes they go, and - spear! Edge hit his spear!" ... "He cut him in half!" - Michael Cole & Tazz

name: I'll Make You Tap
effect:
Search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Submission maneuver, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
You may put 1 Mid-match card in your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile OR if your next card played this turn is a Submission maneuver, it cannot be reversed.
Unique
"You just wait, Mister ... I'm going to make you tap.... It's true! It's true!" - Kurt Angle

name: Look Into My Eyes ... Do You Trust Me?
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, once per turn you may reveal your hand to your opponent, and then you must discard 3 cards, search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
If this card is removed from your Ring area by an effect your opponent controls, you may search your Arsenal for 1 card, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Unique
"Look at me - scream if you want to, but you're never gonna stop me, 'cause I'm never gonna stop!" -- Edge

name: Managed by Paul Heyman
effect:
When this card is in your Ring area, as a Mid-match Action, you may put this card into your Ringside pile, you must discard 1 card, and then put 1 non-Backlash-deck card in your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile.
Universally Unique
"You can't trust that Paul Heyman!" ... "No kidding! He still owes me money!" - Michael Cole & Tazz

name: Managed by Vince McMahon
effect:
The maximum number of Pre-match cards you may have in your Ring area is reduced by 1.
At the end of the Pre-match phase, your opponent must choose to do two of the following: blank the text on a Stipulation card in his Ring area, put a Title Belt card in his Ring area into his Ringside pile, allow you to put up to 1 card from your Ringside pile into your hand, increase the maximum number of Mid-match cards you may have in your Ring area by 1, or concede and lose the match.
Universally Unique
"I don't know how to tell you this, but you have no chance in Hell!" - Mr. McMahon

name: Mutual Respect
effect:
You and your opponent each reveal your hand to each other.
Draw up to 2 cards.
If your next card played this turn is a maneuver of a type you do not have in your Ring area, it cannot be reversed.
Unique
"Folks, we got two of the biggest names in the history of our business, eye to eye, for the first time ever!" - Jim Ross

name: Original <WWE logo> Icon
effect:
Reverse any Action card and end your opponent's turn.
You may put 1 Maneuver card from your Ringside pile into your hand OR search your Arsenal for 1 non-unique Strike maneuver, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.
Unique
"I am a Real American ... Fight for the rights of every man ... I am a Real American ... Fight for what's right - fight for your life!" - Original Theme Song

name: Rock's Spit Punch
effect:
Can only be played if you successfully played a maneuver this turn.
Cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand or Backlash deck.
When successfully played, your opponent overturns 5 cards from his Arsenal into his Ringside pile.
Unique
Stun Value: 1
"One! Two! Three! Rock winds up and puts some sauce on it!" ... "The People's Champ sure delivers with that right hook!" - Michael Cole & Tazz

name: Settle Down, Son
effect:
Look at your opponent's hand, choose up to 3 non-hybrid Maneuver cards, and your opponent discards the chosen card(s).
Unique
"NO! NO! That sonofa---! He's gonna kill 'im! Stop 'im! Someone stop the damn match!" - Jim Ross

name: So Long ... Goodbye!
effect:
Reverse any non-Superstar-specific Action card and end your opponent's turn. Overturn 3 cards from your Arsenal into your Ringside pile.
If the reversed Action card was played from your opponent's hand, it is removed from the game.
Unique
"Whatcha gonna do? Whatcha gonna do when--- No way, brother, you're not gonna do that!" - "Hollywood" Hulk Hogan

name: The Dangerous Alliance
effect:
Superstar Ability:
Whenever your opponent draws up to 3 cards for any reason other than his Superstar Ability or his Draw Segment, you may draw up to the same number of cards. You may play the card titled Handicap Match, even if your opponent cannot play any belt except the Tag Team Title Belts. You cannot play Title Belt cards. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Handicap Match.

name: The People's Team
effect:
Superstar Ability:
When you have 3 different Maneuver card types of 3D or greater in your Ring area, your maneuvers cannot be reversed from your opponent's hand. When you have 4 different Maneuver card types of 3D or greater in your Ring area, your maneuvers also cannot be reversed from your opponent's Backlash deck. You may play the card titled Handicap Match, even if your opponent cannot play any belt except the Tag Team Title Belts. You cannot play Title Belt cards. Your opponent cannot play the card titled Handicap Match.

name: Twelve Years of Terror
effect:
Search your opponent's Backlash deck for 1 card and put it into his Ringside pile.
Unique
"I've been here, bustin' my butt, for twelve long years - and you try that? Just wait, boy, I'm gonna make you famous." - The Undertaker

name: You Can't Stop 'em
effect:
Shuffle up to 6 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal, and then you may put 1 Action card from your Ringside pile into your hand.
Unique
"I've told you, I've told you all, there is no stopping 'The Next Big Thing' Brock Lesnar! You can only hope to contain him." - Paul Heyman

name: Your Brush with Greatness is Over
effect:
You must put 1 Maneuver card with printed 5D or greater from your Ring area into your Ringside pile, and then shuffle 5 cards from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.
Then look at the top 5 cards of your opponent's Arsenal and put them back in any order.
Unique
"You wanted your shot at The Great One...? Well, jabronie, you got it." - The Rock
